keyMoments.title: Gecko Moria Awakens
keyMoments.description: Moria awakens from his four-day slumber to learn that the Straw Hat Pirates have arrived on Thriller Bark. He prepares to face them with his zombie army.
keyMoments.significance: The main antagonist of the Thriller Bark arc makes his debut, establishing himself as a formidable Warlord of the Sea.
keyMoments.quote: Thriller Bark will show you the nightmare to end all nightmares!

keyMoments.title: Revealed as a Warlord of the Sea
keyMoments.description: The Straw Hats learn from the old man that Gecko Moria is one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea, a government-sanctioned pirate.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes the threat level Moria represents and connects him to the world government structure.

bounties.reason: Frozen bounty from before becoming a Warlord of the Sea

abilities.description: Can steal and manipulate shadows using the Kage Kage no Mi powers, implanting them into corpses to create zombies.

relationships.description: Absalom serves as one of Moria's Mysterious Four commanders on Thriller Bark.
Perona serves as one of Moria's Mysterious Four commanders on Thriller Bark.

reveals.information: One of the Seven Warlords of the Sea
Possesses the Kage Kage no Mi, can steal shadows and create zombie army
Massive size at 692 cm tall with devil-like horns and stitches

keyMoments.title: Trio Awakens Moria
keyMoments.description: The three oddly-shaped zombie servants report to Gecko Moria about the Straw Hat Pirates' arrival on Thriller Bark.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Moria's personal errand zombies who serve as his direct assistants.
keyMoments.quote: Master Moria! The Straw Hat Pirates are here!

reveals.information: Personal servants to Gecko Moria, oddly-shaped Soldier Zombies

keyMoments.title: Kumashi Appears with Perona
keyMoments.description: The stuffed bear zombie appears alongside Perona as she prepares for the Night Attack.
keyMoments.significance: Introduces Perona's primary servant and companion, a Wild Zombie with a comedic appearance.

statusHistory.reason: Animated as a stuffed bear zombie by Moria

relationships.description: Serves as Perona's personal servant and companion.

keyMoments.title: Hippo Gentleman Appears in Perona's Garden
keyMoments.description: A large zombie with a hippo's head on a human body appears among the Wild Zombies preparing for battle.
keyMoments.significance: One of many unique zombie designs showcasing the variety of Moria's undead army.

statusHistory.reason: Animated as a Wild Zombie by Moria

reveals.information: Wild Zombie with hippo head and human body, wears a suit

keyMoments.title: Absalom's Face Fully Revealed
keyMoments.description: Absalom's full appearance is shown for the first time, revealing his grotesque combination of human and animal parts. Zombies mock him for his perverted behavior.
keyMoments.significance: Fully establishes Absalom's character design and his reputation among even his own zombie forces.

keyMoments.title: Absalom Rallies Zombie Army
keyMoments.description: Absalom orders the zombie forces to prepare for the Night Attack on the Straw Hat Pirates at midnight.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Absalom's leadership role in Moria's forces and his command over the zombie army.
keyMoments.quote: At the stroke of midnight, we begin the hunt for the pirates!

statusHistory.reason: Active member of Thriller Bark Pirates

abilities.description: Can turn himself and anything he touches invisible using the Suke Suke no Mi.

relationships.description: Serves as one of Moria's Mysterious Four and commander of the Soldier and General Zombies.

reveals.information: Face revealed showing mix of lion and other animal parts with human features
Known as a pervert who spies on women, mocked by zombies

keyMoments.title: Perona Prepares for Battle
keyMoments.description: Perona's negative ghosts return to her as she prepares for the Night Attack alongside her zombie servants including Kumashi.
keyMoments.significance: Confirms Perona's connection to the ghost attacks and shows her preparing as one of the Mysterious Four.

statusHistory.reason: Active member of Thriller Bark Pirates

abilities.description: Creates ghost-like projections that induce extreme negativity and despair in those they pass through.

relationships.description: Serves as one of Moria's Mysterious Four and commander of the Wild Zombies.
Kumashi serves as Perona's loyal servant and companion.
